description: Ground floor rear extension to shop
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | The single storey extension shown in drawing No. 400/01/Rev. A permitted shall be used only for purposes ancillary to the authorised use of the site for A1 (shops).  REASON:	To enable the Local Planning Authority to maintain strict control over the nature of the use, to protect the living conditions of occupiers in the locality. | The flat roof to be created shall not be used to form a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area.  REASON:	To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties.
